transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, good afternoon sir, main IndiaMART se baat kar raha hun, customer manager. Hello?
Customer: Haan sir boliye sir.
Executive: Ji ji sir aapki call aayi thi sir customer care pe, aapne call kiya tha.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To aapko koi issue hai sir IndiaMART ki service thi to aap bata sakte hain sir.
Customer: Sir issue isliye actually mein kya hai mujhe ek maine material ka search karne ke liye maine ye kiya tha sir aur dusri baat hai sir ki isme IndiaMART mein jo bhi aapke matlab ye hai matlab jo bola jaaye unka customer aapka.
Customer: To kya woh genuine rehte hain kya?
Executive: Kya sir sorry sorry sir phir se bataiye.
Customer: Sir main ye bol raha hun ki jo bhi manufacturer jo hai ya trader jo hai sab genuine rehte hain ya phir uske baad kuch fraud bhi kar sakte hain aisa kuch.
Executive: Nahi nahi woh genuine hi hote hain sir woh jo bhi manufacturer aapko upar dikhta hai woh hamare paid services diya hota hai IndiaMART se tabhi hum usko dikhate hain. To wahan pe already aap dekhenge na to wahan pe ek yellow colour ka bhi logo laga hota hai woh trusted TrustSeal ka logo laga hota hai. To woh genuine hote hain sir aur verified supplier. To woh genuine hote hain sir koi problem nahi hai aap kar sakte hain coordinate unse.
Customer: Theek hai sir. Just actually mein kya main usko puchne ke liye call kar raha tha kyunki kya hai maine ek already main bhi paid main bhi aapka trusted seal ka maine liya hai aapke yahan par service aur kya hai ki maine ek bande se main connect hua hun par kya hai ki woh baat ko ek saptaah hone ja raha hai abhi tak material ko lekar ke woh taal raha hai baat ko aaj kar dega kal chutti hai phir sir aisa hai waisa hai matlab karke taal raha hai woh matlab ek seriousness jo hota hai na material ko lekar ke woh nahi dikha raha hai actually mein isliye puch raha hun.
Executive: Kya aap sir aapke liye hai ya product ke liye bol rahe hain?
Customer: Nahi actually maine product ke liye unko diya tha kyunki emergency mein unse connect hua woh manufacturer hai hings ke matlab kabza wagera banate hain. To unka unse connect hua hun par baat ye hai ki unhone unhone bataya ki itna costing hai sab kuch unhone mujhe bata diya. Maine bola theek hai main phir aage apne jo client hai main unko bol kar ke woh done kar liya. Ab PO mere paas aa gaya abhi tak ka unka sample hi nahi aaya sir main problem hua hai.
Customer: Aur main itna delay ho raha hai ki aaj bhi main abhi subah bhi phone kiya tha to unhone bola ki theek hai aaj main bana ke de dunga aapko abhi shaam ho gaya 5:00 baj gaya sir abhi tak sab kuch bhi information nahi hai sir unka.
Executive: Aap mutual discussion kar lijiye sir agar aapko ji ji aap unse mutual discussion kar lijiye. Haan sir main mutual discussion to kar raha hun par baat hai ki banda serious nahi hai main sorry isliye mere ko dikkat ho rahi hai aur main isliye just pucha ki aapse confirm karun ki woh woh matlab woh bande matlab jo bhi rehte hain serious rehte hain ya khali aise hi matlab woh log aise hi bas time pass kar rahe hain.
Executive: Sir woh to sir hamare paas woh to uski hum jankari nahi de sakte ki woh serious hote hain kyunki jab IndiaMART pe registered hote hain to kahin na kahin woh interested hote hain woh seriously hote hain ab woh unke upar.
Customer: Agar ho sake to.
Customer: Sir ho sake to mere ko ek ek do hings jo manufacturer hai unka contact number dijiye sir mujhe.
Executive: Main aapko guide kar deta hun aap IndiaMART.com open kijiyega wahan pe sabse top pe jaake aap product search kijiye jo jo.
Customer: Sir maine already dala tha sir.
Executive: Sir usme maine dala tha par mujhe abhi tak to koi bas khali ek do aadmi ka call aaya woh bhi aisa aadmi tha trader the aur ye banda tha manufacturer par iska New Delhi se inhone kiya tha call connect kiya tha mujhe pichle saptaah brihaspativar ya shukravar ka din ka matter hai sir abhi tak ka unka sample hi dispatch nahi hua.
Executive: Aap bhi connect kar sakte hain first jo aap jaise IndiaMART pe search karenge na to jo bhi aapko pehle first row second row third row mein aise supplier dikh raha hoga to aap first row se sabko call karna start kar dijiye khud bhi aap coordinate kar lenge wahan pe aur ek form fill karne ka option aata hai woh form fill kar dijiye to hamari jo woh buylead ban jaata hai jaise aap buylead use karte hain waise hi buylead generate ho jayega aapke paas phir woh jo bhi consume karega aapko call kar lega sir.
Customer: Theek hai sir main dekhta hun okay sir.
Executive: Baaki aapka jo concern hai main isko close kar de raha hun sir ye number aap save kar lijiye future mein kabhi bhi problem aati hai aap mujhe is number pe call kar sakte hain sir.
Customer: Theek hai sir okay sir.
Executive: Theek hai aapke paas ek feedback mail bhi jayega sir jo bhi aapne mujhse pucha maine aapko sara information provide kara diya hai to main isko close kar raha hun sir aapke paas ek mail bhi jayega sir main close kar dun na sir isko.
Customer: Haan close kar dijiye sir isko.
Executive: Theek hai baaki ye number aap save kar lijiye aap mujhe future mein connect bhi kar sakte hain theek hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai sir okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Enquired if IndiaMART's customers are genuine.

- Expressed concern about a supplier delaying material delivery.

- Requested contact numbers of hings manufacturers.



Resolution:

- Clarified IndiaMART's verification process for suppliers.

- Advised mutual discussion with the supplier.

- Guided to search for manufacturers on IndiaMART website.

- Explained buylead generation process.

- Offered to close the concern and provided contact number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check the website.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- genuineness, manufacturer, delay, buylead, trustseal
